main event: On 7 August 1950, a military pilot observed a dark or black colored object flying at approximately 20,000 feet, initially thought to be an aircraft.
interesting points: The object maintained straight and level flight, The estimated speed of the object was 620 mph, The duration of the observation was about 5 minutes, The object disappeared by fading in the distance, There were no sounds emitted by the object during the sighting.
